BiG-SCAPE
=========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which BiG-SCAPE installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using BiG-SCAPE, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load BiG-SCAPE/1.0.1-intel-2019b-Python-3.7.4
```
